It includes Stargate: Continuum   promo, a 10 minute prelude to Stargate: The ark of truth, also a 20 minute comic con interview with some of the cast and others..  and a half hour making of the ark of truth with interviews of the cast, effects making etc other goodies..  also included a scan of the cover with this package..  and the 10 high quality  wallpapers you could get with the dvd. I honestly enjoyd the ark of truth more than continuum... but anyways enjoy!
